dependencies: Dev/test tooling: eslint, prettier, jest, supertest, husky (package.json)
deployment_relevant_files: Makefile (Terraform helper targets; expects ./terraform which is not present in this repo snapshot)
architectural_resources: Strapi web application/API (containerized; listens on port 1337 per config/server.js and Dockerfiles)
Relational database (MySQL in production implied by .env.example DATABASE_CLIENT=mysql and config/database.js; SQLite supported for local dev)
Container image registry (Docker Hub; build-and-publish.yaml pushes camillehe1992/strapi:<tag>)

AWS deployment implied by CI and docs: ECS Service/Task Definition, Application Load Balancer, IAM roles, CloudWatch Logs/Alarms, S3 bucket for Terraform state (README_TF.md, Makefile, tf-plan-apply workflow)
Secrets/config management for Strapi (APP_KEYS, JWT secrets, API token salts via env vars; .env.example, config/admin.js, config/server.js)
